ayahs.text: {loHamodu lil~ahi {l~a*iY xalaqa {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDa wajaEala {lZ~uluma`ti wa{ln~uwra vum~a {l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ birab~ihimo yaEodiluwna
huwa {l~a*iY xalaqakum m~in TiynK vum~a qaDaY`^ >ajalFA wa>ajalN m~usam~FY Eindahu, vum~a >antumo tamotaruwna
wahuwa {ll~ahu fiY {ls~ama`wa`ti wafiY {lo>aroDi yaEolamu sir~akumo wajahorakumo wayaEolamu maA takosibuwna
wamaA ta>otiyhim m~ino 'aAyapK m~ino 'aAya`ti rab~ihimo <il~aA kaAnuwA@ EanohaA muEoriDiyna
faqado ka*~abuwA@ bi{loHaq~i lam~aA jaA^'ahumo fasawofa ya>otiyhimo >an[ba`^&uA@ maA kaAnuwA@ bihi. yasotahozi'uwna

>alamo yarawoA@ kamo >aholakonaA min qabolihim m~in qaronK m~ak~an~a`humo fiY {lo>aroDi maA lamo numak~in l~akumo wa>arosalonaA {ls~amaA^'a Ealayohim m~idoraArFA wajaEalonaA {lo>anoha`ra tajoriY min taHotihimo fa>aholakona`hum bi*unuwbihimo wa>an$a>onaA min[ baEodihimo qaronFA 'aAxariyna
walawo naz~alonaA Ealayoka kita`bFA fiY qiroTaAsK falamasuwhu bi>ayodiyhimo laqaAla {l~a*iyna kafaruw^A@ <ino ha`*aA^ <il~aA siHorN m~ubiynN
waqaAluwA@ lawolaA^ >unzila Ealayohi malakN walawo >anzalonaA malakFA l~aquDiYa {lo>amoru vum~a laA yunZaruwna
walawo jaEalona`hu malakFA l~ajaEalona`hu rajulFA walalabasonaA Ealayohim m~aA yalobisuwna
walaqadi {sotuhozi}a birusulK m~in qabolika faHaAqa bi{l~a*iyna saxiruwA@ minohum m~aA kaAnuwA@ bihi. yasotahozi'uwna
qulo siyruwA@ fiY {lo>aroDi vum~a {nZuruwA@ kayofa kaAna Ea`qibapu {lomuka*~ibiyna

qul l~iman m~aA fiY {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDi qul l~il~ahi kataba EalaY` nafosihi {lr~aHomapa layajomaEan~akumo <ilaY` yawomi {loqiya`mapi laA rayoba fiyhi {l~a*iyna xasiruw^A@ >anfusahumo fahumo laA yu&ominuwna
walahu, maA sakana fiY {l~ayoli wa{ln~ahaAri wahuwa {ls~amiyEu {loEaliymu
qulo >agayora {ll~ahi >at~axi*u waliy~FA faATiri {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDi wahuwa yuToEimu walaA yuToEamu qulo <in~iY^ >umirotu >ano >akuwna >aw~ala mano >asolama walaA takuwnan~a mina {lomu$orikiyna
qulo <in~iY^ >axaAfu <ino EaSayotu rab~iY Ea*aAba yawomK EaZiymK
m~an yuSorafo Eanohu yawoma}i*K faqado raHimahu, wa*a`lika {lofawozu {lomubiynu
wa<in yamosasoka {ll~ahu biDur~K falaA kaA$ifa lahu,^ <il~aA huwa wa<in yamosasoka bixayorK fahuwa EalaY` kul~i $aYo'K qadiyrN
wahuwa {loqaAhiru fawoqa EibaAdihi. wahuwa {loHakiymu {loxabiyru

qulo >aY~u $aYo'K >akobaru $aha`dapF quli {ll~ahu $ahiydN[ bayoniY wabayonakumo wa>uwHiYa <ilaY~a ha`*aA {loquro'aAnu li>un*irakum bihi. waman[ balaga >a}in~akumo lata$ohaduwna >an~a maEa {ll~ahi 'aAlihapF >uxoraY` qul l~aA^ >a$ohadu qulo <in~amaA huwa <ila`hN wa`HidN wa<in~aniY bariY^'N m~im~aA tu$orikuwna
{l~a*iyna 'aAtayona`humu {lokita`ba yaEorifuwnahu, kamaA yaEorifuwna >abonaA^'ahumu {l~a*iyna xasiruw^A@ >anfusahumo fahumo laA yu&ominuwna
wamano >aZolamu mim~ani {fotaraY` EalaY {ll~ahi ka*ibFA >awo ka*~aba bi_#aAya`tihi.^ <in~ahu, laA yufoliHu {lZ~a`limuwna
wayawoma naHo$uruhumo jamiyEFA vum~a naquwlu lil~a*iyna >a$orakuw^A@ >ayona $urakaA^&ukumu {l~a*iyna kuntumo tazoEumuwna
vum~a lamo takun fitonatuhumo <il~aA^ >an qaAluwA@ wa{ll~ahi rab~inaA maA kun~aA mu$orikiyna
{nZuro kayofa ka*abuwA@ EalaY`^ >anfusihimo waDal~a Eanohum m~aA kaAnuwA@ yafotaruwna

waminohum m~an yasotamiEu <ilayoka wajaEalonaA EalaY` quluwbihimo >akin~apF >an yafoqahuwhu wafiY^ 'aA*aAnihimo waqorFA wa<in yarawoA@ kul~a 'aAyapK l~aA yu&ominuwA@ bihaA Hat~aY`^ <i*aA jaA^'uwka yuja`diluwnaka yaquwlu {l~a*iyna kafaruw^A@ <ino ha`*aA^ <il~aA^ >asa`Tiyru {lo>aw~aliyna
wahumo yanohawona Eanohu wayano_#awona Eanohu wa<in yuholikuwna <il~aA^ >anfusahumo wamaA ya$oEuruwna
walawo taraY`^ <i*o wuqifuwA@ EalaY {ln~aAri faqaAluwA@ ya`layotanaA nurad~u walaA nuka*~iba bi_#aAya`ti rab~inaA wanakuwna mina {lomu&ominiyna
balo badaA lahum m~aA kaAnuwA@ yuxofuwna min qabolu walawo rud~uwA@ laEaAduwA@ limaA nuhuwA@ Eanohu wa<in~ahumo laka`*ibuwna
waqaAluw^A@ <ino hiYa <il~aA HayaAtunaA {ld~unoyaA wamaA naHonu bimaboEuwviyna
walawo taraY`^ <i*o wuqifuwA@ EalaY` rab~ihimo qaAla >alayosa ha`*aA bi{loHaq~i qaAluwA@ balaY` warab~inaA qaAla fa*uwquwA@ {loEa*aAba bimaA kuntumo takofuruwna

qado xasira {l~a*iyna ka*~abuwA@ biliqaA^'i {ll~ahi Hat~aY`^ <i*aA jaA^'atohumu {ls~aAEapu bagotapF qaAluwA@ ya`HasoratanaA EalaY` maA far~aTonaA fiyhaA wahumo yaHomiluwna >awozaArahumo EalaY` Zuhuwrihimo >alaA saA^'a maA yaziruwna
wamaA {loHayaw`pu {ld~unoyaA^ <il~aA laEibN walahowN walald~aAru {lo'aAxirapu xayorN l~il~a*iyna yat~aquwna >afalaA taEoqiluwna
qado naEolamu <in~ahu, layaHozunuka {l~a*iY yaquwluwna fa<in~ahumo laA yuka*~ibuwnaka wala`kin~a {lZ~a`limiyna bi_#aAya`ti {ll~ahi yajoHaduwna
walaqado ku*~ibato rusulN m~in qabolika faSabaruwA@ EalaY` maA ku*~ibuwA@ wa>uw*uwA@ Hat~aY`^ >ataY`humo naSorunaA walaA mubad~ila likalima`ti {ll~ahi walaqado jaA^'aka min n~aba<iY@ {lomurosaliyna

wa<in kaAna kabura Ealayoka <iEoraADuhumo fa<ini {sotaTaEota >an tabotagiYa nafaqFA fiY {lo>aroDi >awo sul~amFA fiY {ls~amaA^'i fata>otiyahum bi_#aAyapK walawo $aA^'a {ll~ahu lajamaEahumo EalaY {lohudaY` falaA takuwnan~a mina {loja`hiliyna
<in~amaA yasotajiybu {l~a*iyna yasomaEuwna wa{lomawotaY` yaboEavuhumu {ll~ahu vum~a <ilayohi yurojaEuwna
waqaAluwA@ lawolaA nuz~ila Ealayohi 'aAyapN m~in r~ab~ihi. qulo <in~a {ll~aha qaAdirN EalaY`^ >an yunaz~ila 'aAyapF wala`kin~a >akovarahumo laA yaEolamuwna
wamaA min daA^b~apK fiY {lo>aroDi walaA Ta`^}irK yaTiyru bijanaAHayohi <il~aA^ >umamN >amovaAlukum m~aA far~aTonaA fiY {lokita`bi min $aYo'K vum~a <ilaY` rab~ihimo yuHo$aruwna
wa{l~a*iyna ka*~abuwA@ bi_#aAya`tinaA Sum~N wabukomN fiY {lZ~uluma`ti man ya$a<i {ll~ahu yuDolilohu waman ya$a>o yajoEalohu EalaY` Sira`TK m~usotaqiymK
qulo >ara'ayotakumo <ino >ataY`kumo Ea*aAbu {ll~ahi >awo >atatokumu {ls~aAEapu >agayora {ll~ahi tadoEuwna <in kuntumo Sa`diqiyna
balo <iy~aAhu tadoEuwna fayako$ifu maA tadoEuwna <ilayohi <in $aA^'a watansawona maA tu$orikuwna

falawolaA^ <i*o jaA^'ahum ba>osunaA taDar~aEuwA@ wala`kin qasato quluwbuhumo wazay~ana lahumu {l$~ayoTa`nu maA kaAnuwA@ yaEomaluwna
falam~aA nasuwA@ maA *uk~iruwA@ bihi. fataHonaA Ealayohimo >abowa`ba kul~i $aYo'K Hat~aY`^ <i*aA fariHuwA@ bimaA^ >uwtuw^A@ >axa*ona`hum bagotapF fa<i*aA hum m~ubolisuwna

qulo >ara'ayotakumo <ino >ataY`kumo Ea*aAbu {ll~ahi bagotapF >awo jahorapF halo yuholaku <il~aA {loqawomu {lZ~a`limuwna
wamaA nurosilu {lomurosaliyna <il~aA muba$~iriyna wamun*iriyna famano 'aAmana wa>aSolaHa falaA xawofN Ealayohimo walaA humo yaHozanuwna
wa{l~a*iyna ka*~abuwA@ bi_#aAya`tinaA yamas~uhumu {loEa*aAbu bimaA kaAnuwA@ yafosuquwna

qul l~aA^ >aquwlu lakumo EindiY xazaA^}inu {ll~ahi walaA^ >aEolamu {logayoba walaA^ >aquwlu lakumo <in~iY malakN <ino >at~abiEu <il~aA maA yuwHaY`^ <ilaY~a qulo halo yasotawiY {lo>aEomaY` wa{lobaSiyru >afalaA tatafak~aruwna
wa>an*iro bihi {l~a*iyna yaxaAfuwna >an yuHo$aruw^A@ <ilaY` rab~ihimo layosa lahum m~in duwnihi. waliY~N walaA $afiyEN l~aEal~ahumo yat~aquwna

walaA taTorudi {l~a*iyna yadoEuwna rab~ahum bi{logadaw`pi wa{loEa$iY~i yuriyduwna wajohahu, maA Ealayoka mino HisaAbihim m~in $aYo'K wamaA mino HisaAbika Ealayohim m~in $aYo'K fataTorudahumo fatakuwna mina {lZ~a`limiyna
waka*a`lika fatan~aA baEoDahum bibaEoDK l~iyaquwluw^A@ >aha`^&ulaA^'i man~a {ll~ahu Ealayohim m~in[ bayoninaA^ >alayosa {ll~ahu bi>aEolama bi{l$~a`kiriyna

qulo <in~iY EalaY` bay~inapK m~in r~ab~iY waka*~abotum bihi. maA EindiY maA tasotaEojiluwna bihi.^ <ini {loHukomu <il~aA lil~ahi yaquS~u {loHaq~a wahuwa xayoru {lofa`Siliyna
qul l~awo >an~a EindiY maA tasotaEojiluwna bihi. laquDiYa {lo>amoru bayoniY wabayonakumo wa{ll~ahu >aEolamu bi{lZ~a`limiyna

waEindahu, mafaAtiHu {logayobi laA yaEolamuhaA^ <il~aA huwa wayaEolamu maA fiY {lobar~i wa{lobaHori wamaA tasoquTu min waraqapK <il~aA yaEolamuhaA walaA Hab~apK fiY Zuluma`ti {lo>aroDi walaA raTobK walaA yaAbisK <il~aA fiY kita`bK m~ubiynK

wahuwa {l~a*iY yatawaf~aY`kum bi{l~ayoli wayaEolamu maA jaraHotum bi{ln~ahaAri vum~a yaboEavukumo fiyhi liyuqoDaY`^ >ajalN m~usam~FY vum~a <ilayohi marojiEukumo vum~a yunab~i}ukum bimaA kuntumo taEomaluwna

vum~a rud~uw^A@ <ilaY {ll~ahi mawolaY`humu {loHaq~i >alaA lahu {loHukomu wahuwa >asoraEu {loHa`sibiyna
qulo man yunaj~iykum m~in Zuluma`ti {lobar~i wa{lobaHori tadoEuwnahu, taDar~uEFA waxufoyapF l~a}ino >anjaY`naA mino ha`*ihi. lanakuwnan~a mina {l$~a`kiriyna
quli {ll~ahu yunaj~iykum m~inohaA wamin kul~i karobK vum~a >antumo tu$orikuwna

qulo huwa {loqaAdiru EalaY`^ >an yaboEava Ealayokumo Ea*aAbFA m~in fawoqikumo >awo min taHoti >arojulikumo >awo yalobisakumo $iyaEFA wayu*iyqa baEoDakum ba>osa baEoDK {nZuro kayofa nuSar~ifu {lo'aAya`ti laEal~ahumo yafoqahuwna
waka*~aba bihi. qawomuka wahuwa {loHaq~u qul l~asotu Ealayokum biwakiylK
l~ikul~i naba<K m~usotaqar~N wasawofa taEolamuwna

wa<i*aA ra>ayota {l~a*iyna yaxuwDuwna fiY^ 'aAya`tinaA fa>aEoriDo Eanohumo Hat~aY` yaxuwDuwA@ fiY HadiyvK gayorihi. wa<im~aA yunsiyan~aka {l$~ayoTa`nu falaA taqoEudo baEoda {l*~ikoraY` maEa {loqawomi {lZ~a`limiyna
wamaA EalaY {l~a*iyna yat~aquwna mino HisaAbihim m~in $aYo'K wala`kin *ikoraY` laEal~ahumo yat~aquwna

wa*ari {l~a*iyna {t~axa*uwA@ diynahumo laEibFA walahowFA wagar~atohumu {loHayaw`pu {ld~unoyaA wa*ak~iro bihi.^ >an tubosala nafosN[ bimaA kasabato layosa lahaA min duwni {ll~ahi waliY~N walaA $afiyEN wa<in taEodilo kul~a EadolK l~aA yu&oxa*o minohaA^ >uw@la`^}ika {l~a*iyna >ubosiluwA@ bimaA kasabuwA@ lahumo $araAbN m~ino HamiymK waEa*aAbN >aliymN[ bimaA kaAnuwA@ yakofuruwna

qulo >anadoEuwA@ min duwni {ll~ahi maA laA yanfaEunaA walaA yaDur~unaA wanurad~u EalaY`^ >aEoqaAbinaA baEoda <i*o hadaY`naA {ll~ahu ka{l~a*iY {sotahowatohu {l$~aya`Tiynu fiY {lo>aroDi HayoraAna lahu,^ >aSoHa`bN yadoEuwnahu,^ <ilaY {lohudaY {}otinaA qulo <in~a hudaY {ll~ahi huwa {lohudaY` wa>umironaA linusolima lirab~i {loEa`lamiyna
wa>ano >aqiymuwA@ {lS~alaw`pa wa{t~aquwhu wahuwa {l~a*iY^ <ilayohi tuHo$aruwna

wahuwa {l~a*iY xalaqa {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDa bi{loHaq~i wayawoma yaquwlu kun fayakuwnu qawoluhu {loHaq~u walahu {lomuloku yawoma yunfaxu fiY {lS~uwri Ea`limu {logayobi wa{l$~aha`dapi wahuwa {loHakiymu {loxabiyru
wa<i*o qaAla <ibora`hiymu li>abiyhi 'aAzara >atat~axi*u >aSonaAmFA 'aAlihapF <in~iY^ >araY`ka waqawomaka fiY Dala`lK m~ubiynK
waka*a`lika nuriY^ <ibora`hiyma malakuwta {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDi waliyakuwna mina {lomuwqiniyna

falam~aA ra'aA {loqamara baAzigFA qaAla ha`*aA rab~iY falam~aA^ >afala qaAla la}in l~amo yahodiniY rab~iY la>akuwnan~a mina {loqawomi {lD~aA^l~iyna
falam~aA ra'aA {l$~amosa baAzigapF qaAla ha`*aA rab~iY ha`*aA^ >akobaru falam~aA^ >afalato qaAla ya`qawomi <in~iY bariY^'N m~im~aA tu$orikuwna
<in~iY waj~ahotu wajohiYa lil~a*iY faTara {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDa HaniyfFA wamaA^ >anaA" mina {lomu$orikiyna

waHaA^j~ahu, qawomuhu, qaAla >atuHa`^j~uw^n~iY fiY {ll~ahi waqado hadaY`ni walaA^ >axaAfu maA tu$orikuwna bihi.^ <il~aA^ >an ya$aA^'a rab~iY $ayo_#FA wasiEa rab~iY kul~a $aYo'K EilomFA >afalaA tata*ak~aruwna
wakayofa >axaAfu maA^ >a$orakotumo walaA taxaAfuwna >an~akumo >a$orakotum bi{ll~ahi maA lamo yunaz~ilo bihi. Ealayokumo suloTa`nFA fa>aY~u {lofariyqayoni >aHaq~u bi{lo>amoni <in kuntumo taEolamuwna
{l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ walamo yalobisuw^A@ <iyma`nahum biZulomK >uw@la`^}ika lahumu {lo>amonu wahum m~uhotaduwna
watiloka Huj~atunaA^ 'aAtayona`haA^ <ibora`hiyma EalaY` qawomihi. narofaEu daraja`tK m~an n~a$aA^'u <in~a rab~aka HakiymN EaliymN

wawahabonaA lahu,^ <isoHa`qa wayaEoquwba kul~FA hadayonaA wanuwHFA hadayonaA min qabolu wamin *ur~iy~atihi. daAwu,da wasulayoma`na wa>ay~uwba wayuwsufa wamuwsaY` waha`ruwna waka*a`lika najoziY {lomuHosiniyna

wa<isoma`Eiyla wa{loyasaEa wayuwnusa waluwTFA wakul~FA faD~alonaA EalaY {loEa`lamiyna

*a`lika hudaY {ll~ahi yahodiY bihi. man ya$aA^'u mino EibaAdihi. walawo >a$orakuwA@ laHabiTa Eanohum m~aA kaAnuwA@ yaEomaluwna
>uw@la`^}ika {l~a*iyna 'aAtayona`humu {lokita`ba wa{loHukoma wa{ln~ubuw~apa fa<in yakofuro bihaA ha`^&ulaA^'i faqado wak~alonaA bihaA qawomFA l~ayosuwA@ bihaA bika`firiyna
>uw@la`^}ika {l~a*iyna hadaY {ll~ahu fabihudaY`humu {qotadiho qul l~aA^ >aso_#alukumo Ealayohi >ajorFA <ino huwa <il~aA *ikoraY` liloEa`lamiyna

wamaA qadaruwA@ {ll~aha Haq~a qadorihi.^ <i*o qaAluwA@ maA^ >anzala {ll~ahu EalaY` ba$arK m~in $aYo'K qulo mano >anzala {lokita`ba {l~a*iY jaA^'a bihi. muwsaY` nuwrFA wahudFY l~iln~aAsi tajoEaluwnahu, qaraATiysa tuboduwnahaA watuxofuwna kaviyrFA waEul~imotum m~aA lamo taEolamuw^A@ >antumo walaA^ 'aAbaA^&ukumo quli {ll~ahu vum~a *arohumo fiY xawoDihimo yaloEabuwna

waha`*aA kita`bN >anzalona`hu mubaArakN m~uSad~iqu {l~a*iY bayona yadayohi walitun*ira >um~a {loquraY` wamano HawolahaA wa{l~a*iyna yu&ominuwna bi{lo'aAxirapi yu&ominuwna bihi. wahumo EalaY` SalaAtihimo yuHaAfiZuwna
